TEXT.TITLE: RHODES <RHDS> SEES SHARPLY LOWER 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Rhodes Inc said it now estimates fourth quarter, ended February 28, earnings were eight cts a share, down from the 25 cts earned in the final quarter of fiscal 1986. The company said the major causes for the reduction were an unfavorable LIFO adjustment and softer than projected sales in the quarter, due primarily to unfavorable weather. Despite the 4th qtr results, Rhodes said, "net income for the year just ended should come close to the record level of the previous year" -- 1.61 dlrs dlrs a share. Reuter
